subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description: The proposed project seeks to contribute to strengthening the rule of law, human rights protection and administration of justice by rolling out targeted capacity building interventions in five key areas: i) establishing a GBV prosecutorial unit at the MoJ to preside over the prosecution of SGBV and a roving prosecutor to ensure access to justice in needy areas; ii) providing institutional support to the TRC, the INCHR, and enhancing a human rights awareness at all levels iii) strengthening the judiciary with an information system – comprising a website, court facilities database and a rule of law resource center;  iv) mainstreaming gender issues in policy and programming; and iv) supporting the modernizing process of the national legislature through finalization and launch of the Strategic Plan and support to urgent institutional capacity building needs,
donor_long: UNDP AS AA FOR JP PASS THROUGH
subproject.title: Strengthening Rule of Law & Ad
